sources.title: Knowledge Graphs for Scholarly Writing
sources.abstract: Knowledge graphs provide explicit structure for entities and relations in scientific narratives. They support disambiguation and reasoning across claims.

sources.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation in Practice
sources.abstract: Retrieval-augmented generation grounds LLM outputs in external evidence. Robust chunking and ranking are key to citation quality.

sources.title: Cooperative Agent Workflows
sources.abstract: Multi-agent systems can separate drafting, critique, and revision duties. This decomposition improves controllability for long-form generation.
